## SendableKumo.withdrawCollateral() method

Adjust existing Trove by withdrawing some of its collateral.

**Signature:**

```typescript
withdrawCollateral(asset: string, amount: Decimalish): Promise<SentKumoTransaction<S, KumoReceipt<R, TroveAdjustmentDetails>>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  asset | string |  |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | The amount of collateral to withdraw from the Trove. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[SentKumoTransaction](./lib-base.sentkumotransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;S, [KumoReceipt](./lib-base.kumoreceipt.md)<!-- -->&lt;R, [TroveAdjustmentDetails](./lib-base.troveadjustmentdetails.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;&gt;

## Remarks

Equivalent to:

```typescript
adjustTrove({ withdrawCollateral: amount })
```
